column5: I've been doing this for years on end with my kids and now their kids. Try it toninght
Huh?   I just tried it, did not work

Yah just can't set it and expect to hold lol  "cradle" the egg with your thumbs and two fingers and 'gently' try to make it stand, it will take a bit but when the yoke is in the right position you will feel it and it will hold.
I see you are also a wizard!
